actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967 to abolish the Commission on Executive, Legislative and Judicial Salaries.

summary.text: Abolishes the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, to be effective on the date of enactment, except with respect to recommendations made by the President under the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967 before enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967 to abolish the Commission on Executive, Legislative and Judicial Salaries.
